text:
Minister for Forests M.S.M. Anandan gave away the ‘Best school awards’ of the State Government to three government schools in the district.

They were: Corporation Middle School at '15 Velampalayam', Corporation Elementary School at Aramanaipudur, and Government Elementary School at Karikankattupudur.

District Collector G. Govindaraj; district panchayat chairman M. Shanmugam; senior officials from Education Department; and elected representatives of Assembly, and civic bodies, were present.

- Staff Reporter
title: Award for three schools
